title: Task 1: Describe visual or contextual elements of a work of art, including: form, style, materials, content, function, context, siting/physical context, subject matter, or reception of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately describe the content of Xu Bing’s A Book from the Sky.
Response accurately content of Xu Bing’s A Book from the Sky.

title: Task 2: Describe visual or contextual elements of a work of art, including: form, style, materials, content, function, context, siting/physical context, subject matter, or reception of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately describe the political context of Xu Bing’s A Book from the Sky.
Response accurately uses ONE example of specific evidence to accurately describe the political context of Xu Bing’s A Book from the Sky.

title: Task 3: Using specific evidence, explains how a specific work of art (or group of related works) demonstrates continuity within an artistic tradition, style, or practice
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use specific VISUAL evidence to explain how Xu Bing’s A Book from the Sky demonstrates continuity with Chinese artistic traditions.
Response accurately use specific VISUAL evidence to explain how Xu Bing’s A Book from the Sky demonstrates continuity with Chinese artistic traditions.

title: Task 4: Using specific evidence, explains how a specific work of art (or group of related works) demonstrates change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use specific VISUAL evidence to explain how A Book from the Sky demonstrates changes from Chinese artistic traditions.
Response accurately uses specific VISUAL evidence to explain how A Book from the Sky demonstrates changes from Chinese artistic traditions.

title: Task 5: Using specific evidence, explains how context influenced artistic choices
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately explain how Xu Bing's artistic decisions were influenced by the political context in which the work was created.
Response accurately explains how Xu Bing's artistic decisions were influenced by the political context in which the work was created.
